statements: DELETE FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE migration_reason = 'War' AND destination_country = 'Germany';
DELETE FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE refugee_id = 101 AND year_of_migration = 2019;
DELETE FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria' AND migration_reason = 'War conflict';
DELETE FROM migration_trends WHERE year = 2020 AND country_id = 1;
DELETE FROM country_info WHERE region = 'Asia' AND population < 10000000;
DELETE FROM migration_trends WHERE year < 2010 AND country_id IN (1, 2);
DELETE FROM country_info WHERE country_name = 'Germany' AND region = 'Europe';
DELETE FROM RefugeeDemographics WHERE country_id = 10 AND age_group = 'Adult';
